flavor: "If you want to put your money where your mouth is, there are some picketers who could use your support."
stripped_text: Gain 4 credits. When this event is trashed from your grip or stack, you may gain 2 credits.
text:
Gain 4[credit].
When this event is trashed from your grip or stack, you may gain 2[credit].
title: Strike Fund

flavor:
"You ask how we can even try to stop them? A simple answer: not alone."
—Sebastião Souza Pessoa
stripped_text: Trash the top 4 cards of your stack. You may install 1 of those cards, paying 3 credits less.
text: Trash the top 4 cards of your stack. You may install 1 of those cards, paying 3[credit] less.
title: The Price

flavor: It is hard, once free, to learn when to call for help.
stripped_text: The first time each turn you trash a Corp card, place 1 power counter on this hardware. When your turn begins, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to draw 1 card or remove 1 tag.
text:
The first time each turn you trash a Corp card, place 1 power counter on this hardware.
When your turn begins, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to draw 1 card or remove 1 tag.
title: Solidarity Badge

flavor:
"What do you want from me, blood?"
—S3ym0ur
stripped_text: Whenever you trash a card you are accessing, place 1 virus counter on this program. Interface -> Hosted virus counter: Break up to 2 subroutines. Trash 1 card from your grip: +3 strength.
text: Whenever you trash a card you are accessing, place 1 virus counter on this program. Interface → Hosted virus counter: Break up to 2 subroutines. Trash 1 card from your grip: +3 strength.
title: Audrey v2

flavor: Above the maze of smoke and swinging fists, they saw the banner waving.
stripped_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Subroutines on the barrier you are encountering cannot end the run for the remainder of this encounter.
text: Interface → 2[credit]: Subroutines on the barrier you are encountering cannot end the run for the remainder of this encounter.
title: Banner

flavor: Random sabotage accomplishes little; better to strike their weakest points again and again.
stripped_text: Install only on a piece of ice. Host ice gets -2 strength. Each other piece of ice protecting this server gets -1 strength.
text:
Install only on a piece of ice.
Host ice gets −2 strength. Each other piece of ice protecting this server gets −1 strength.
title: Monkeywrench

flavor: Luciana loved it when mamãe and papai finished work early, so they could all go home together.
stripped_text: Once per turn -> click, take 1 tag: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, breach R&D. Threat 3 -> Whenever you breach R&D during a run on Archives, access 1 additional card. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)
text: Once per turn → [click], take 1 tag: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, breach R&D. Threat 3 → Whenever you breach R&D during a run on Archives, access 1 additional card. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)
title: Eru Ayase-Pessoa

flavor: "How far shall we go this time?"
stripped_text: Once per turn -> click: Gain click. Run a remote server. When that run ends, if it was unsuccessful, take 1 tag. click, trash: Gain click click. Remove 1 tag.
text: Once per turn → [click]: Gain [click]. Run a remote server. When that run ends, if it was unsuccessful, take 1 tag. [click], [trash]: Gain [click][click]. Remove 1 tag.
title: Hannah "Wheels" Pilintra

flavor:
"Animals, tea, meetings, dead drops. Paranoá has you covered, so we keep them covered."
—Sebastião Souza Pessoa
stripped_text: The first time each turn the Corp installs a card in the root of a server, you may trash the top card of your stack to draw 1 card.
text: The first time each turn the Corp installs a card in the root of a server, you may trash the top card of your stack to draw 1 card.
title: Lago Paranoá Shelter

flavor: I decided; I am free.
stripped_text: Once per turn -> When you breach HQ or R&D during a run, if you did not break any subroutines during that run, you may access 1 additional card.
text: Once per turn → When you breach HQ or R&D during a run, if you did not break any subroutines during that run, you may access 1 additional card.
title: Mercury: Chrome Libertador

flavor: Even the tiniest scrap of data can become the key to riches.
stripped_text: The Corp may reveal an agenda from HQ. If they do, gain click and draw 1 card. Otherwise, look at the top 3 cards of R&D.
text: The Corp may reveal an agenda from HQ. If they do, gain [click] and draw 1 card. Otherwise, look at the top 3 cards of R&D.
title: Chrysopoeian Skimming

stripped_text: Run a central server. The first time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, bypass it. Threat 4 -> The second time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, you may spend click to bypass it. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.)
text: Run a central server. The first time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, bypass it. Threat 4 → The second time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, you may spend [click] to bypass it. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.)
title: S-Dobrado

flavor:
"One day I looked into the mirror and saw not my own reflection, but a new friend eager to help me."
—Mercury
stripped_text: Whenever you bypass a piece of ice, you may remove this hardware from the game to derez that ice.
text: Whenever you bypass a piece of ice, you may remove this hardware from the game to derez that ice.
title: Capybara

flavor: This world is not beautiful, and yet that is why it is.
stripped_text: +1 mu Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, add 1 unrezzed card to HQ. Limit 1 console per player.
text: +1[mu] Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, add 1 unrezzed card to HQ. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Hermes

flavor: Take only what you need.
stripped_text: Whenever you encounter a barrier, you may spend 3 hosted power counters to bypass it. Whenever this program fully breaks a piece of ice, place 1 power counter on this program. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength.
text: Whenever you encounter a barrier, you may spend 3 hosted power counters to bypass it. Whenever this program fully breaks a piece of ice, place 1 power counter on this program. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
title: Curupira

flavor: Dazzle. Disorient. Disappear.
stripped_text: Whenever you encounter a piece of AP, destroyer, or observer ice, you may trash this program to bypass that ice.
text: Whenever you encounter a piece of AP, destroyer, or observer ice, you may trash this program to bypass that ice.
title: Laser Pointer

flavor:
I am life, I am sun,
Iʼm a trap, Iʼm a gun,
Iʼm the wind in the dust,
Iʼm the devil that you trust.
stripped_text: Install only on a piece of ice. Whenever host ice is rezzed or derezzed, gain 3 credits.
text:
Install only on a piece of ice.
Whenever host ice is rezzed or derezzed, gain 3[credit].
title: Saci

flavor:
"Corporate security regards me as merely another Nico, and that shall ever be their mistake."
—Mercury
stripped_text: Threat 4 -> This program gets -2 strength. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.) Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2 credits: +2 strength.
text: Threat 4 → This program gets −2 strength. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.) Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +2 strength.
title: Shibboleth

stripped_text: Threat 4 -> When you install this resource, place 2 credits on it. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.) Whenever you play a run event, place 1 credit on this resource. click: Run any server. You can spend hosted credits during that run.
text: Threat 4 → When you install this resource, place 2[credit] on it. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.) Whenever you play a run event, place 1[credit] on this resource. [click]: Run any server. You can spend hosted credits during that run.
title: Debbie "Downtown" Moreira

flavor: Art knows no borders.
stripped_text: Once per turn -> 0[credit]: Install 1 program from your grip (paying its install cost). Use this ability only during a run. When that run ends, trash that program if it is not a trojan.
text: Once per turn → 0[credit]: Install 1 program from your grip (paying its install cost). Use this ability only during a run. When that run ends, trash that program if it is not a trojan.
title: Arissana Rocha Nahu: Street Artist

flavor: Designed by 2020 American Continental Champion Jason Ford
stripped_text: Run R&D. If successful, draw 5 cards.
text: Run R&D. If successful, draw 5 cards.
title: Joy Ride

stripped_text: When you install this hardware, load 3 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it. Interrupt -> Hosted power counter: Prevent 1 net damage. Use this ability only during a run. Interrupt -> Hosted power counter: Prevent a "when encountered" ability on a piece of ice.
text: When you install this hardware, load 3 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it. [interrupt] → Hosted power counter: Prevent 1 net damage. Use this ability only during a run. [interrupt] → Hosted power counter: Prevent a "when encountered" ability on a piece of ice.
title: AirbladeX (JSRF Ed.)

flavor: Leaps and bounds better than the competition!
stripped_text: +2 mu The first time each turn you install a program, you may draw 1 card. Limit 1 console per player.
text: +2[mu] The first time each turn you install a program, you may draw 1 card. Limit 1 console per player.
title: LilyPAD

text: Install only on a piece of ice. Threat 4 → When you install this program, it gets +3 strength for the remainder of the turn. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.) Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on a sentry protecting this server. 1[credit]: +2 strength.
title: Living Mural

flavor:
"From up here, I can see everything. And from down there, everyone can see this."
—Víbora

text:
Install only on a piece of ice.

"I consider it an improvement."
—Arissana Rocha Nahu

text: Install only on a piece of ice. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on host ice. Use this ability only once per encounter.
title: Slap Vandal

flavor:
"However bad it gets out there, know that weʼll still have each other."
—Tom "Spider" Milhas
stripped_text: This program can only interface with ice hosting a trojan program. Interface -> 2 credits: Break up to 3 code gate subroutines. If at least 1 subroutine was broken this way, each player may draw 1 card.
text: This program can only interface with ice hosting a trojan program. Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 3 code gate subroutines. If at least 1 subroutine was broken this way, each player may draw 1 card.
title: Umbrella

flavor: "And who can tell me what sort of practical applications this has?"
stripped_text: click click: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, breach R&D. When you do, access 1 additional card.
text: [click][click]: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, breach R&D. When you do, access 1 additional card.
title: Beatriz Friere Gonzalez

flavor: "...and here, we can see an excellent example of meta neo-Gemeosianism."
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may add 1 installed non-virus trojan program to your grip. If you do, place 2 credits on this resource. You can spend hosted credits to install cards.
text: When your turn begins, you may add 1 installed non-virus trojan program to your grip. If you do, place 2[credit] on this resource. You can spend hosted credits to install cards.
title: Urban Art Vernissage

stripped_text: Run any server. If successful, resolve 2 of the following in any order: * Draw 2 cards. * Install 1 card from your grip, paying 1 credit less. * Remove 1 tag. * Place 4 credits on this event. You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs for the remainder of this run.
text:
Run any server. If successful, resolve 2 of the following in any order:
  • Draw 2 cards.
  • Install 1 card from your grip, paying 1[credit] less.
  • Remove 1 tag.
  • Place 4[credit] on this event. You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs for the remainder of this run.
title: Bahia Bands

flavor: "Yes, that explosion was quite loud. May I pour you another drink?"
stripped_text: Whenever you score an agenda (including this one), you may do 1 core damage.
text: Whenever you score an agenda (including this one), you may do 1 core damage.
title: Salvo Testing

flavor: Exceeding expectations for armor superiority.
stripped_text: Each run, as long a a piece of ice has been derezzed during that run, each installed icebreaker gets -2 strength. Once per turn -> When a run begins, you may derez 1 piece of ice not protecting the attacked server to gain 1[credit].
text: Each run, as long a a piece of ice has been derezzed during that run, each installed icebreaker gets –2 strength. Once per turn → When a run begins, you may derez 1 piece of ice not protecting the attacked server to gain 1[credit].
title: Stegodon MK IV

flavor: "Free" as in markets, "cheap" as in beer.
stripped_text: Whenever you finish taking an action, if you have taken that action exactly 3 times this turn, gain click.
text: Whenever you finish taking an action, if you have taken that action exactly 3 times this turn, gain [click].
title: Wage Workers

text: Threat 3 → When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may install 1 non-agenda card from HQ or Archives in the root of or protecting another server. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.) [subroutine] End the run.
title: Ablative Barrier

flavor:
"Hey Br3n-N, just doing the hourly check-in. I saw a weird cyber-echo near your last node. You OK, mate?"
—Moth
stripped_text: Threat 4 -> When the Runner encounters this ice, give them 1 tag unless they spend click. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.) Subroutine Give the Runner 1 tag. Subroutine If the Runner is tagged, do 1 core damage.
text: Threat 4 → When the Runner encounters this ice, give them 1 tag unless they spend [click]. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.) [subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag. [subroutine] If the Runner is tagged, do 1 core damage.
title: Jaguarundi

flavor: We make these arms for all, so that none who oppose peace would risk their own destruction.
stripped_text: trash: End the run unless the Runner spends click. Use this ability only during a run on this server. Subroutine The Runner loses click. Subroutine The Runner loses click. Subroutine End the run.
text: [trash]: End the run unless the Runner spends [click]. Use this ability only during a run on this server. [subroutine] The Runner loses [click]. [subroutine] The Runner loses [click]. [subroutine] End the run.
title: M.I.C.

flavor: "Haas-Bioroid deeply appreciates your assistance in locating our... employee."
stripped_text: Gain 5 credits. You may install 1 card from HQ. You may remove 1 tag to place 1 advancement counter on that card.
text: Gain 5[credit]. You may install 1 card from HQ. You may remove 1 tag to place 1 advancement counter on that card.
title: Greasing the Palm

stripped_text: The rez cost of each piece of ice protecting this server is lowered by 2 credits. Threat 4 -> The rez cost of each card in the root of this server is lowered by 2 credits. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.) When your turn ends, you may move this upgrade to the root of another server.
text: The rez cost of each piece of ice protecting this server is lowered by 2[credit]. Threat 4 → The rez cost of each card in the root of this server is lowered by 2[credit]. title: Vovô Ozetti

flavor: Caveant Fugitivi.
stripped_text: Limit 2 remote servers. The first time each turn you install a card in the root of or protecting a remote server, you may install 1 card from HQ in the root of or protecting another remote server, ignoring all costs. You cannot score the second card this turn.
text:
Limit 2 remote servers.
The first time each turn you install a card in the root of or protecting a remote server, you may install 1 card from HQ in the root of or protecting another remote server, ignoring all costs. You cannot score the second card this turn.
title: A Teia: IP Recovery

flavor: Deep down, she knew Benício wasnʼt coming back.
stripped_text: When this agenda is scored or stolen, do 2 net damage.
text: When this agenda is scored or stolen, do 2 net damage.
title: Fujii Asset Retrieval

flavor: "Do you take walk-ins?"
stripped_text: Rez only during your turn. The first run each turn cannot be made against a remote server. The first time each turn a run on Archives begins, if this server is not protected by ice, do 2 net damage.
text:
Rez only during your turn.
The first run each turn cannot be made against a remote server.
The first time each turn a run on Archives begins, if this server is not protected by ice, do 2 net damage.

text: Threat 3 → The Runner cannot spend credits while subroutines on this ice are resolving. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.) title: Attini

flavor: The construct turns to you, eyes wild. "Beloved," it asks, "is that you?"

text:
When the Runner passes this ice, if there are 4 or more cards in the grip, give them 1 tag.

title: Phoneutria

flavor: Next! Designed by 2020 Intercontinental Champion Yannick Stucki
stripped_text: When the Runner passes this ice, you may swap it with a piece of ice from HQ. If you do, gain 4 credits. (The new ice is installed unrezzed. You do not pay an install cost.) Subroutine End the run.
text: When the Runner passes this ice, you may swap it with a piece of ice from HQ. If you do, gain 4[credit]. (The new ice is installed unrezzed. You do not pay an install cost.) [subroutine] End the run.
title: Tatu-Bola

flavor:
"When you stretch a mind it expands, sometimes until it snaps."
—Adrian Seis
stripped_text: Resolve 1 of the following: * Gain 4 credits and draw 2 cards. Add 1 card from HQ to the top of R&D. * Do X net damage. X is equal to the number of tags the Runner has, up to 3.
text:
Resolve 1 of the following:
  • Gain 4[credit] and draw 2 cards. Add 1 card from HQ to the top of R&D.
  • Do X net damage. X is equal to the number of tags the Runner has, up to 3.
title: Mindscaping

stripped_text: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0-2 credits. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, the Runner cannot access cards other than this upgrade for the remainder of that run. If the bids match, the Runner cannot access this upgrade for the remainder of that run. When your turn ends, you may move this upgrade to the root of another server.
text: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0–2[credit]. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, the Runner cannot access cards other than this upgrade for the remainder of that run. If the bids match, the Runner cannot access this upgrade for the remainder of that run. When your turn ends, you may move this upgrade to the root of another server.
title: Adrian Seis

flavor: "They call me turncoat. I call them broke."
stripped_text: As an additional cost to trash this upgrade, the Runner must add 2 cards from the grip at random to the bottom of the stack. Persistent -> As an additional cost to steal an agenda from this server or its root, the Runner must add 2 cards from the grip at random to the bottom of the stack.

text: The first time each turn the Runner steals or trashes a Corp card, place 1 power counter on this identity. [click], hosted power counter: Look at the top 3 cards of R&D. You may install 1 of those cards.
title: Epiphany Analytica: Nations Undivided

flavor:
"You really thought weʼd let you keep this data?"
—The Holo Man

text: When the Runner steals this agenda, give them 1 tag. [click], remove 1 tag: Shuffle this agenda into R&D. The Corp can use this ability only if this agenda is in the Runner's score area.
title: Oracle Thinktank

flavor: "A lively but peaceful crowd of concerned counter-protesters have come out to—damn it, cut! Can we get the sledgehammer out of the frame?"

text: When your turn begins, you may choose a card type to look at the top card of R&D. If that card has the chosen type, you may reveal it and gain 2[credit].
title: Balanced Coverage

flavor: Be afraid.

text:
While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in Archives, you may pay 4[credit] to give them 2 tags.

flavor: Raising money is useful, but discovering which politician is in need of it is vastly more important.

text: When your turn begins, you may look at the top 3 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order. Then, if this server is not protected by ice, you may draw 1 card.

flavor: An exemplar of Starlightʼs hubris, it stands vigil over secrets of hypocrisy.

title: Starlit Knight

flavor:
"No one has ever told me to get lost so politely."
—Arissana Rocha Nahu

flavor: Merely a fun little personality test.

text: Gain 1[credit] for each card in HQ.

flavor: Acres of rainforest live or die by quarterly revenue projections.

text: [click], 1[credit], reveal and trash this agenda from HQ: Place 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card that you can advance.

text: Whenever you rez a piece of ice, place 2[credit] on this asset. You can spend hosted credits to pay install costs. [trash]: Take all credits from this asset.

flavor: The forest around them grew denser with each beat of their heart.

title: Tree Line

flavor:
"The only rule you need to remember is that it makes the rules."
—Pumpkin-and-Dumplin

title: Valentão

flavor:
"Nuvem pays us to guard this land, and thatʼs all there is to it."
—Angelique Garza Correa

text: Gain 3[credit]. Gain 1[credit] for each card type among faceup cards in Archives. If any of those cards are agendas, gain another 2[credit].

Threat 3 -> You may play or install 1 card from HQ. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)

title: Pivot

flavor: "Shoot!"
stripped_text: Threat 3 -> click, 1 credit, reveal and trash this upgrade from HQ: Do 1 meat damage. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.) When the Runner accesses this upgrade while it is rezzed, you may pay 2 credits to do 2 meat damage.
text: Threat 3 → [click], 1[credit], reveal and trash this upgrade from HQ: Do 1 meat damage. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.) When the Runner accesses this upgrade while it is rezzed, you may pay 2[credit] to do 2 meat damage.
title: Angelique Garza Correa

flavor: Their mouths are ever open, blaring sirens never to cease.
stripped_text: Remote server only. Persistent -> Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen from the root of this server, you may search R&D for 1 piece of ice. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Install and rez that ice, paying a total of 3 credits less.
